titles.title: A concurrent resolution expressing the sense of the Congress that any freeze or reduction in budget levels which may be imposed by or pursuant to law should not apply to the Panama Canal Commission.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries.
Executive Comment Requested from Panama Canal Comm.
Referred to Subcommittee on Panama Canal and Outer Continental Shelf.

committee.subcommittee: Panama Canal and Outer Continental Shelf
committee.name: House Merchant Marine and Fisheries

bill.summary: 11/9/1987--Introduced. Expresses the sense of the Congress that any freeze or reduction in Government budget levels for FY 1987 should not apply to the Panama Canal Commission.
